overview: A Jazz pianist is kidnapped at gun point late one night in Harlem  3rd year Animated film made at the university of Lincoln. Based around a true story of Fats Waller in the 1930s. By William Healy, Chad Clapson-Blake, Jack Spencer, Jake Sanderson and Conor Hunt. with Music by Conal Fowkes and sound design by William Dutton 2018
tagline: A Jazz pianist is kidnapped at gun point late one night in Harlem
title: The Harlem Nocturne
